name: vocaline-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Vocaline application (Backend and Frontend)

scripts.build:frontend: cd vocaline-frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd vocaline-backend && npm install && cd ../vocaline-frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd vocaline-frontend && npm install --production && npm run build
